title: BRIEF-China Banking Corp Approves Capital Raising Up To 15 Bln Pesos
text:
BRIEF-China Banking Corp Approves Capital Raising Up To 15 Bln Pesos

Stock Markets 47 minutes ago (Sep 05, 2019 09:30)

BRIEF-China Banking Corp Approves Capital Raising Up To 15 Bln Pesos Sept 5 (Reuters) - China Banking Corp :

* CHINA BANKING CORP - APPROVED CAPITAL RAISING EXERCISE UP

TO 15

BILLION PESOS IN THE FORM OF PHP-DENOMINATED TIER 2 CAPITAL

NOTES,



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSX7LMFXm

Further company coverage: CHIB.PS





BRIEF-China Banking Corp Approves Capital Raising Up To 15 Bln Pesos
